message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which holds significant value for us at $10000. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would greatly benefit you as well. Considering its true worth and the opportunity it presents, I kindly propose a price of $9500 for this product. This offer allows you to acquire an item that is not only valuable but also aligns with your needs and preferences. I look forward to your consideration and the possibility of bringing this product into your possession.
